Articles.Content: It would be nice to see a section for xbox user to chat and discuss what we are going to do on launch!
I could see a console section once that time comes, I'll certainly have some posts for my PS4 edition.

Moved this over to the Kerbal Network, the forum about the forum itself. Forumception!

If it were my decision, I would keep everyone together and just add some support tags for PS4 and XBox One, assuming that the console versions are very close to the PC version. If the console versions are significantly different in anything other than controls then maybe a dedicated subforum for them would be a good idea.

assuming that the console versions are very close to the PC version.

While I'm sure the Stock game will be pretty similar and thus comparable, there are obviously a lot of people who use mods which (probably) won't be on the console versions. It might be nice for console players to have a place to have discussion (I cannot for the life of me come up with a simple, non-somehow-offensive way to say what I'm trying to say) in a like-minded environment (mod-free environment? idk. Still sounds weird.) But that just makes me think having an area of the forum that's just for Stock things should exist, which seems kind of silly to me, so maybe tags are good enough. Plus we don't want to purposefully force anyone out of one area and into another, that's bad for pretty obvious reasons.

I could definitely see wanting to have a small section of the forum where the console versions are the "expected" version, which might be a bit more welcoming to newer console players. Someone who doesn't realize the difference between the console version and the PC version might post a thread asking about how people figure out how much fuel they need to get to orbit without using the console tags or specifying they're on the console (not expecting it to matter), and they'll get slammed with "use KER" and "use MechJeb" posts that really aren't helpful to them. That wouldn't happen in a dedicated console subforum.

Random, not totally coherent thoughts on the subject that might lead to some other people having more coherent thoughts
With the WiiU edition announced, a console subforum with a general area, and some subsubforums (like International) for each console would make me happy. That is if it were up to me.

... I would keep everyone together and just add some support tags for PS4 and XBox One, ...

Mixing ps4, xbox, mac and pc gamer (etc.). It's going to be a lot of fun.
